list.name: CHILL-PILL
list.description: Though furious, Ash has to collect himself. A full Rage meter will recover x health when this gadget is popped - less Rage, less recovery.
list.descriptionHtml: Though furious, Ash has to collect himself. A full Rage meter will recover x health when this gadget is popped - less Rage, less recovery.

list.name: ROTTEN-BANANA
list.description: Ash loses <ccc0000>x% health and instantly gains x% rage.
list.descriptionHtml: Ash loses x% health and instantly gains x% rage.
